attributes.action: prevent the demolition of Fritton Woods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fritton Woods is an area of land that many people get enjoyment out of visiting. It is part of the landscape in Fritton, and not to mention the fact there are many types of wildlife that live there. It is now to be turned into a pit to mine for aggregate. We need to save it!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent the demolition of Fritton Woods."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17581


Prime Minister's Office
